Greetings to President of Niger
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Niger 
   Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mamadou Tandja, President of the Republic of Niger, on Dec. 14 on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its proclamation.
 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his work for national unity and economic prosperity.

articles.title: "Sun's Great Medal" and Certificate Awarded to "Arirang"
articles.content:
"Sun's Great Medal" and Certificate Awarded to "Arirang" 
   Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The National Association of Writers and Artists of Peru awarded the "Sun's Great Medal" and certificate of the association to Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance "Arirang" on Dec. 6.
 The "Sun's Great Medal" and the certificate were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Peru by Chairman of the association Jose Antonio Gamara Puertas on Dec.9.    
 Conveying them to the ambassador, the chairman said that one can hardly watch the above said "Arirang" in any other parts of the world, adding that this extravaganza can be produced only in the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who is a great master of idea, leadership and arts.

DPRK Delegation Leaves for Six-Party Talks
   Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation headed by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Kye Gwan left here Saturday to participate in the six-party talks to open in Beijing on Dec. 18.
 It was seen off at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, officials concerned, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming and Russian Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim here Alexander Matsegora.
